text: Nanaji Sitaram Shamkule is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Chandrapur Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). In May, 2013 he was appointed BJP's Maharashtra state SC cell. He was Member Legislative Assembly in 2009, also as a BJP member. Shamkule, before he became MLA in 2009, was a corporator in the Nagpur Municipal Corporation, from ward no 114, Takli Sim. ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:Living people Category:People from Chandrapur Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2009–2014 Category:Marathi politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nanaji Sitaram Shamkule
